# type

**Instance Property**

Specifies the predefined transition type.

## Declaration

```swift
var type: CATransitionType { get set }
```

## Discussion

The possible values are shown in [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/common-transition-types]. This property is ignored if a custom transition is specified in the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CATransition/filter] property. The default is [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CATransitionType/fade].

## Transition Properties

- **subtype**: Specifies an optional subtype that indicates the direction for the predefined motion-based transitions.

items.description: Specifies an optional subtype that indicates the direction for the predefined motion-based transitions.
